item.name: Empress Vineyard
item.address1: Drapers Road, Irrewarra, Vic 3250 (postal Amberley House, 391 Sandy Bay Road, Hobart, Tas 7005)
item.winemaker: Robin Brockett, Cate Looney, Lisa Togni
item.description: If the address of Empress and its Geographic Zone seem schizophrenic, dont be alarmed. Allistair Lindsay has moved to Hobart, but has decided to retain Empress Vineyard, and to ramp it up again (his words) as the wines have found a ready market in Hobart.
